com.github.mathiewz.slick.opengl.renderer

Class ImmediateModeOGLRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.slick.opengl.renderer.ImmediateModeOGLRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SGL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VAOGLRenderer

    public class ImmediateModeOGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SGL
    The default OpenGL renderer, uses immediate mode for everything
    Author:
    kevin
